Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment API Medicare Opt Out Affidavits API Medicare Order and Referring API Medicare Physician & Other Practitioners APIs Medicare Revalidation Due Date API Medicare Revalidation Clinic Group Practice Reassignment API Medicare Provider and Supplier Taxonomy Crosswalk API NPPES NPI Public Registry API

Search the Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment API

Source: R/provider_mppe.R
provider_mppe.Rd

Information on a point in time snapshot of enrollment level data for providers actively enrolled in Medicare.

Usage

provider_mppe(
  npi = NULL,
  last = NULL,
  first = NULL,
  type_desc = NULL,
  clean_names = TRUE,
  full = FALSE
)

Arguments

npi

10-digit National Provider Identifier (NPI).

last

Provider's last name

first

Provider's first name

type_desc

description of Provider specialty (taxonomy).

clean_names

Clean column names with janitor's clean_names() function; default is TRUE.

full

If true, downloads the first 1000 rows of data; default is FALSE.

Value

A tibble() containing the search results.

The Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment

This dataset includes information on providers who are actively approved to bill Medicare or have completed the 855O at the time the data was pulled from the Provider Enrollment and Chain Ownership System (PECOS).

These files are populated from PECOS and contain basic enrollment and provider information, reassignment of benefits information and practice location city, state and zip.

These files are not intended to be used as real-time reporting as the data changes from day to day and the files are updated only on a quarterly basis. If any information on these files needs to be updated, the provider needs to contact their respective Medicare Administrative Contractor (MAC) to have that information updated.

This data does not include information on opt-out providers. Information is redacted where necessary to protect Medicare provider privacy.

Data Update Frequency

Quarterly

Data Source

Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services

Links

  • Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment API

  • Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment Data Dictionary

  • Provider Enrollment and Chain Ownership System Site

Examples

if (FALSE) {
provider_mppe(npi = 1003026055)

provider_mppe(last = "phadke", first = "radhika")

provider_mppe(type_desc = "endocrinology")

# Unnamed List of NPIs
npi_list <- c(1003026055,
              1316405939,
              1720392988,
              1518184605,
              1922056829,
              1083879860)

npi_list |> purrr::map_dfr(provider_mppe)

# Data frame of NPIs
npi_df <- data.frame(npi = c(1003026055,
                             1316405939,
                             1720392988,
                             1518184605,
                             1922056829,
                             1083879860))
npi_df |>
tibble::deframe() |>
purrr::map_dfr(provider_mppe)

# Download First 1,000 Rows of Dataset =====================================
provider_mppe(full = TRUE)
}
